channel.title: Using Dialouge.cfg?
channel.description:
How do i use it to make npc's talk not above their heads but in the window at the bottom (in a frame i think...)
Don't have to use dialouges.cfg but just tell me a way!!!
P.S: I looked through TUT list couldn't find anything so if you find 1 that you believe willl help me please post link :)

item.title: Using Dialouge.cfg?
item.dc:creator: @bburton31 bburton31
item.description:
@bburton31 wrote:

kk oh and btw your tut on gates didn’t work for the gate in brimhaven?

case 1596:
if (objectX == 2935 && objectY == 3450) { //Member gate to brimhaven
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,2630, -1);
}
else { //If the gate hasn't been coded yet.
sendMessage("I'm afriad this gate is locked.");
}
break;


case 1597:
if (objectX == 2816) {  // Members gate to brimhaven
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,2630, -3);
}
else if(objectX == 3008) {
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,2630, -2);
}
else {
ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,2630, 0);
}
break;

don’t do nothing… why?

Read full topic

item.title: Using Dialouge.cfg?
item.dc:creator: @Screwy Screwy
item.description:
@Screwy wrote:

Click Search at the top and type “dialogues”.
